name: Dopamine (itch)
description: you use the arrow keys to move around. the objective of the game is to eat the burgers. when consumed coins and spiders pop up. spiders are your enemy and if you hit them you lose a life.  there is a one in five chance that onced you eat a burger you get a cleaner. this is a small women that clears the spiders. the love hearts that appear are your lives. so you can regain them and also lose them when hit by the enemy.  eating the food is how your get more advanced in the game.  each coin or piece of food you consume increases your score by five. with the shield you can hit anything and wont lose a life, but once youve hit an object it disapears.
